game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has no meaning, the fabric of reality is threatened by an ancient evil known as the Devourer. The last remnants of humanity are tasked with finding the fabled Echoes of Eternity, powerful artifacts capable of restoring balance to the timestream.
game.beginning: Players take on the role of a temporal guardian, awakened in a desolate future where the Devourer has already consumed most of human civilization. Guided by an enigmatic figure known only as the Architect, they embark on a perilous journey through time to gather allies and resources for the ultimate showdown against the Devourer.
game.ending: With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, players must confront the true nature of the Devourer and make a choice that will determine the course of eternity. Will they restore the original timeline, forge a new reality, or succumb to the void? The fate of existence rests in their hands.
